title: Change the amount of heat passing through door

content.question: In time t, an amount of heat Q flows through the solid door of area A and thickness d represented above. The temperatures on each side of the door are T2 and T1, respectively. Which of the following changes would be certain to decrease Q ?

choices.label: Increasing d and T2 - T1 only
Decreasing A and T2 - T1 only
Increasing d, A, and T2 - T1

content.answer: Decreasing A and T2 - T1 only

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
